name: National Mentor Healthcare Network
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: National Mentor Healthcare Network is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Jacksonville, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $115.0M in Medicaid payments across 293K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $115.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,370 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
